title: Supernatural Being Template
description: Defines a supernatural being -- demigod, familiar, spirit, superhero, or notable figure. Demi-gods serve specific functions and are easy to create on-the-fly.

origin.description: How this being came to exist

role_function.description: Role or function in the world (messenger, harbinger, guardian, bonded companion)

relation_to_mortals.description: How this being interacts with and views mortals

location.description: Where this being is typically found

bonding_mechanics.description: For familiars: how bonding works, who can bond, consequences

x-cross-references.god-profile: May be children of or servants to gods
x-cross-references.magic-system-overview: May be part of a magic system (familiars)
